SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Class Player handles, at the end of a player's turn, the calculation of his new score
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname)
      Constrcutor for Player makes sure the connected attribute is set to true, as the player is connecting right now
      Parameters:
      nickname - is passed by the Player during the connection

  • Method Details

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Returns:
      the player's nickname

    • getShelf

      public Shelf getShelf()
      Returns:
      the player's shelf

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore()
      handles the operation to update the score a Player after the server receives and executes on the model a move from the active player at the moment. It doesn't pass it back as an argument, it updates the Player's attribute "playerScore"

    • setEndGameToken

      public void setEndGameToken(EndGameToken endGameToken)
      when a Player is awarded a EndGameToken, it is set as his attribute and this method also occupies of setting the player's nickname in the takenBy attribute of EndGameToken
      Parameters:
      endGameToken -

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard(BoardFactory board)
      Parameters:
      board - is set as the new Player's board

    • setCommonTargetCardList

      public void setCommonTargetCardList(List<CommonTargetCard> commonTargetCardList)
      Parameters:
      commonTargetCardList - is set as the new Player's commonTargetCardList

    • setShelf

      public void setShelf(Shelf shelf)
      Parameters:
      shelf - is set as the new Player's shelf

    • setPersonalTargetCard

      public void setPersonalTargetCard(PersonalTargetCard personalTargetCard)
      Parameters:
      personalTargetCard - is set as the new Player's personalTargetCard

    • addScoringToken

      public void addScoringToken(ScoringToken scoringToken)
      when a player gets assigned a scoringToken, it is passed to him via this fucntion
      Parameters:
      scoringToken - is added to the player's scoringTokenList

    • getScoringToken

      public ScoringToken getScoringToken(int i)
      For testing purposes
      Parameters:
      i - selects the scoringToken in the position i of the scoringTokenList arrayList of player and then that scoringToken is returned

    • setConnected

      public void setConnected(boolean connected)
      Parameters:
      connected - is used to set the Player's attribute value

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Returns:
      the player's attribute connected

    • getPlayerScore

      public int getPlayerScore()
      Returns:
      the current player's score

    • getPersonalTargetCard

      public PersonalTargetCard getPersonalTargetCard()
      Returns:
      the player's personalTargetCard

    • checkColumnChosen

      public boolean checkColumnChosen(int numberOfItemsPicked, int column)
      is used to check whether a column chosen is valid, during the execution of a move for a player
      Parameters:
      numberOfItemsPicked - is needed in order to check if the slots available in the column are enough
      column - represents which column was picked
      Returns:
      true if the move can be executed, false otherwise

    • getCommonTargetCardList

      public List<CommonTargetCard> getCommonTargetCardList()
      Returns:
      the player's commonTargetCardList

    • getBoard

      public BoardFactory getBoard()
      Returns:
      the player's board

    • getScoringTokenList

      public List<ScoringToken> getScoringTokenList()
      Returns:
      the player's scoringTokenList

    • hasEndGameToken

      public boolean hasEndGameToken()
      Returns:
      true if a player was assigned a EndGameToken, false otherwise

    • setPlayerScore

      public void setPlayerScore(int playerScore)
      used when a game is being restored to a previous state
      Parameters:
      playerScore - is used to restore the player's previous score

    • setScoringTokenList

      public void setScoringTokenList(List<ScoringToken> scoringTokenList)
      used when a game is being restored to a previous state
      Parameters:
      scoringTokenList - is used to restore the player's previous scoringTokenList
